name: Pair of Squares
description:
Pair of squares is a captivating little puzzle game that will thrill you endlessly! Match tiles of the same color, make epic combos and level up. As you advance, the game becomes more challenging, but none the less delightful. Come up with strategies, fill up the game boards and then watch them blow up in a big blast. Build your spatial reasoning skills and see how far you can get!

The rules are simple: place pairs of colorful tiles and match them horizontally and vertically to win points. Match more than three of the same color to make an exploding tile. Place exploding tiles and trigger chain reactions to clear up the game boards.

The game offers eight different power-ups, unique soundtrack and a colorblind mode.
